item.title: Introduction to StanfordNLP: An NLP Library for 53 Languages (with Python code)
item.description: Introduction to StanfordNLP: An NLP Library for 53 Languages (with Python code) [ read more ] A tutorial on Stanford’s latest library - StanfordNLP. I showcase an implementation on basic NLP tasks in… 8 min read Web Architecture 101 [ read more ] The basic architecture concepts I wish I knew when I was getting started as a web developer 11 min read Natural Language Processing is Fun!
